CustomField.description: How long, in seconds, that the Auth.net gateway should check for duplicates after a transaction is submitted.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: How long, in seconds, that the Auth.net gateway should check for duplicates after a transaction is submitted. If the value is set to 0 or to a negative number, no duplicate transaction window will be enforced. The maximum value is 28800, which equals eight hours. If a value greater than 28800 sent, the payment gateway will default to 28800.
CustomField.label: Duplicate window
